name: heise werbefrei
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("www.heise.de"), domain("tarifrechner.heise.de"), domain("shop.heise.de") {
.GoogleActiveViewClass,
.adbottom clearfix,
.adbottom,
.adbottom_itmarkt,
.adbottom_jobs,
.teaser_hbs,
.us_ad,
.teaser_adliste,
#jobware-teaser,
#teaser_newsletter_2014,
.ct_banner,
.bcadv,
.promoad,
#bannerzone,
.pos-ad-high,
.ad-high,
.bottom-ad-fr,
.k-icon anzeige,
#anzeige,
.werbung,
.adsense {display: none !important;}
#sitemap,
#navi_bottom,
#news_notify_hint,
.teaser_unternehmen {display: none !important;}
h4:first-child + .teaser_mit_bild_und_text, aside > div,
div#mitte_news + div, div.k-icon.anzeige,
object,
iframe,
embed {display: none !important;}
#container_content {top: 0px !important;}
.mainframe {clear: both; float: none; margin-top: 0px; max-width: 0em; position: unset ; width: 100%;}
}
